23  Module::Module(Bus& canbus, const uint8_t moduleId) :
24  m_ModuleId(moduleId),
25  m_Bus(canbus),
26  m_bIsRunning(true),
27  m_pWriteThread(nullptr),
28  m_MotorPosition(0),
29  m_DIO(0),

31  m_CurrentTimeStamp(0),
32  m_MotorMinPosition(-32655),

60  void Module::Stop()
61  {
62  m_bIsRunning = false;
63  if (m_pWriteThread != nullptr)
64  {
65  m_pWriteThread->join();
66  delete m_pWriteThread;
67  m_pWriteThread = nullptr;
68  }
69  }
70 
72  void Module::Start()
73  {
74  m_bIsRunning = true;
75  m_pWriteThread = new std::thread(WriteThread, this);
76  }

81  {
82  return m_ModuleId;

87  void Module::WriteThread(Module * pModule)
88  {
89  pModule->WriteLoop();
90  }
91 
93  void Module::WriteLoop()
94  {
95  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Write thread started.");
96  while (m_bIsRunning)
97  {
98  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point last=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
99  set_DesiredPosition(m_MotorPosition+m_MotorIncrement);
100  Command_SetJoint(m_MotorPosition, m_DIO);
101  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point current=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
102  int64_t ms=(std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(current - last)).count();
103  if(ms<50)
104  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(m_UpdateInterval-ms));
105  }
106  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Write thread terminating.");
107  }
108 
111  int32_t Module::get_DesiredPosition() const
112  {
113  return m_MotorPosition;
114  }
115 
118  void Module::set_DesiredPosition(const int32_t ticks)
119  {
120  m_MotorPosition = ticks;
121  int32_t M=std::max(m_MotorMinPosition,m_MotorMaxPosition); // values of min and max may be swapped if gear ratios are negative
122  int32_t m=std::min(m_MotorMinPosition,m_MotorMaxPosition);
123  if(m_MotorPosition<m)
124  {
125  ROS_INFO("Module %u: Clamping position %i to minium of %i ticks.",m_ModuleId,m_MotorPosition,m);
126  m_MotorPosition=m;
127  }
128  if(m_MotorPosition>M)
129  {
130  ROS_INFO("Module %u: Clamping position %i to maximum of %i ticks.",m_ModuleId,m_MotorPosition,M);
131  m_MotorPosition=M;
132  }
133  }
134 
137  double Module::get_UpdateInterval() const
138  {
139  return 0.001*(double)m_UpdateInterval;
140  }
141 
142 
146  void Module::Command_SetJoint(const int32_t ticks, const uint8_t dio)
147  {
148  struct can_frame frame;
149  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
150  frame.can_dlc = 8;
151  frame.data[0] = 0x14;
152  frame.data[1] = 0x00;
153  int32_t positionWithOffset=ticks+m_MotorPositionOffset;
154  frame.data[2] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0xFF000000u) >> 24;
155  frame.data[3] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x00FF0000u) >> 16;
156  frame.data[4] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x0000FF00u) >> 8;
157  frame.data[5] = ((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x000000FFu;
158  frame.data[6] = m_CurrentTimeStamp;
159  m_CurrentTimeStamp=(uint8_t)((((uint32_t)m_CurrentTimeStamp)+1)&0xFF);
160  frame.data[7] = dio;
161  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
162  }
163 
165  void Module::Command_ResetError()
166  {
167  struct can_frame frame;
168  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
169  frame.can_dlc = 2;
170  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
171  frame.data[1] = 0x06;
172  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
173  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
174  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
175  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
176  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
177  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
178  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
179  }

182  void Module::Command_DisableMotor()
183  {
184  struct can_frame frame;
185  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
186  frame.can_dlc = 2;
187  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
188  frame.data[1] = 0x0a;
189  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
190  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
191  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
192  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
193  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
194  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
195  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
196  }

233  void Module::Command_SetZeroPosition()
234  {
235  struct can_frame frame;
236  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
237  frame.can_dlc = 4;
238  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
239  frame.data[1] = 0x08;
240  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
241  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
242  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
243  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
244  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
245  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
246  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);

257  int32_t Module::get_CurrentPosition(uint8_t& timeStamp, std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point& receptionTime, uint8_t& errorFlags, uint8_t& dataBits) const
258  {
259  const canid_t id = (canid_t)((m_ModuleId << 4) + 1);
260  bool bValid=false;
261  struct can_frame frame = m_Bus.get_LastFrame(id, receptionTime, bValid);
262  if(bValid)
263  {
264  timeStamp=(uint8_t)frame.data[5];
265  errorFlags=(uint8_t)frame.data[0];
266  dataBits=(uint8_t)frame.data[7];
267  return ((int32_t)((((uint32_t)frame.data[1]) << 24) | (((uint32_t)frame.data[2]) << 16) | (((uint32_t)frame.data[3]) << 8) | ((uint32_t)frame.data[4])))-m_MotorPositionOffset;
268  }
269  else
270  {
271  receptionTime=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
272  errorFlags=0x00;
273  dataBits=0x00;
274  return 0;
275  }
276  }
277 
279  void Module::Enable()
280  {
281  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Enabling motor.");
282  Command_ResetError();
283  uint8_t timeStamp;
284  uint8_t errorFlags;
285  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point updateTime;
286  uint8_t dataBits;
287  int32_t real = get_CurrentPosition(timeStamp, updateTime, errorFlags, dataBits);
288  m_MotorPosition = real;
289  Command_EnableMotor();
290  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
291  Command_EnableMotor();
292  }
293 
295  void Module::Disable()
296  {
297  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Disabling motor.");
298  Command_DisableMotor();
299  }
300 
302  void Module::StartReferencing()
303  {
304  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Referencing started.");
305  Command_StartReferencing();
306  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
307  Command_StartReferencing();
308  }
309 
311  void Module::SetZero()
312  {(uint32_t)
313  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Setting to zero.");
314  Command_SetZeroPosition();
315  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
316  Command_SetZeroPosition();
317  uint8_t timeStamp;
318  uint8_t errorFlags;
319  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point updateTime;
320  uint8_t dataBits;
321  m_MotorPosition = get_CurrentPosition(timeStamp, updateTime, errorFlags, dataBits);
322  }
